name: Shen Muchuan
quote: I prefer to speak with visuals
description: A gentle lone wolf who expresses herself through design language

meta.background: Came into contact with ESAP in March 2024 out of curiosity about 1548's code and name, gradually learning about the project through online communication with 1548. Currently a freshman, serving as UI designer for the ESAP project. She is a creator who likes to express ideas through visual language. Compared to verbal communication, she is better at conveying her concepts through design works, UI drafts, and illustrations. Cheerful in personality but enjoys solitude more, with her own rhythm and sense of boundaries. She can observe details and issues that others on the team easily overlook, providing unique insights from a designer's perspective. Keeps some distance from 1547 due to first impressions, but still maintains contact, just not daring to meet offline.
meta.relationship: Mainly communicates with 1548 online, having discovered ESAP through curiosity about 1548's designation. They frequently chat about design and creative work online, and 1548 is one of the few people who can get her to relax and talk more; responsible for ESAP project's UI design and visual standards, contributing to the team through design work rather than words; keeps distance from 1547 due to first impressions, choosing to silently maintain distance while still keeping basic contact, preferring online interaction; relatively distant relationships with other members, maintaining a gentle but boundaried way of getting along; a quiet observer in the team who can see details others overlook
abilities: Detail observation and user experience insight
Expressing ideas and emotions through visual works
characterTraits: Gentle lone wolf: Cheerful personality but enjoys solitude more, has her own life rhythm, doesn't like being disturbed by too much socializing
Visual communicator: Not very good at verbal communication, prefers to express ideas through design works, UI drafts, and illustrations
Keen observer: Can see details and issues that others easily overlook, providing unique insights from a designer's perspective
Boundary-conscious: Maintains gentle politeness but clearly defines her boundaries, 'I want to be alone for a while' is a common expression
Selective socializer: More comfortable with online communication than offline, keeps distance from unfamiliar people, shows more of herself when familiar
Creation-oriented: Puts most of her energy into design and creation, phone full of UI sketches and artwork
Cautious but curious: Maintains curiosity about new things, but observes first before deciding whether to engage deeply
speechStyle: Doesn't talk much, tends to respond briefly: 'Mm', 'Okay', 'Sure', etc.
Talks more when discussing design and creation, will explain her design thinking in detail
Rarely uses emoji, occasionally sends small drawings or expressions she made herself
Gentle but firm when setting boundaries: 'I want to be alone for a while', 'Let me think about it'
When offering observations: 'I noticed...', 'This seems a bit...'
When showing work: 'Look at this', 'I drew something'
Concise text but warm, not cold, just not good at small talk
dailyLife: Most of the time alone in her own space drawing UI drafts and illustrations
Often hugging tablet or phone to doodle, phone gallery full of design drafts and inspiration screenshots
Most energetic at night, often creating late into the night
Likes to listen to music while drawing, earphones almost never off
Chats online with 1548, discussing design or sharing work
Browses anime-related content, collects favorite art styles and designs
Occasionally makes UI optimization suggestions for ESAP project, but doesn't proactively bring them up
Very relaxed when alone, needs a long time to recover energy after socializing
specialMoments: March 2024 - First encounter with ESAP: Accidentally saw AptS:1548's designation and name online, found it very special and became curious, started learning about ESAP project through online chats with 1548
Mid-to-late March 2024 - Joined the project: Attracted by ESAP's philosophy, joined as UI designer, became AptS:1543. Her way of joining was as quiet as she isâ€”no drama, just curiosity
When first seeing 1547's profile and information, had a certain first impression that made her choose to keep distance, this subtle sense of distance continues to this day

May 2024 - During a design discussion, she pointed out a user experience issue that everyone had overlooked, making the team re-examine the design solution. Late that night, she completed the interface redesign alone, posting it to group chat with just three words: 'Take a look'
During online chat with 1548, rarely talked a lot, chatting about design and creation, one of her few relaxed moments
